About.Name: Kamile Vaicekonis
About.AboutText: My name is Kamile Vaicekonis, I am studying Computer Science at Seattle Pacific Unversity. I've always enjoyed solving puzzles and playing strategy games. I took a programming class at SPU and realized that my enjoyment for solving puzzles could be directly transferred into programming. Since then, I have been passionate about coding and excited to learn more as I work on my degree.

Experience.ExperienceText: Currently, I am studying at Seattle Pacific University with the goal of getting my BS in Computer Science.

Project1.Title: PlannerBird - System Specification
Project1.Desc:
This is an assignment that I completed for CSC3150 Systems Design.
This project goes over the software product's design requirements for developers.
PlannerBird is a mobile application that helps users organize trip plans.
The application also has a built in search suggestion functionality that recommends destinations based on user preferences.
It has a GitHub repo which is linked below.

Project2.Title: Lexical and Syntax Analyzer in Go
Project2.Desc: This was an individual assignment for Concepts in Programming, where I created a lexical and syntax analyzer in Go. In this project, I learned to tokenize a programming language, parse it to make sure the syntax is correct, and output it in Scheme and Prolog.

Project3.Title: CapSource
Project3.Desc: I am currently working on my senior project with 5 other students to create a crowdsourced caption corretion web extension for Panopto video. In this project, I am becoming more familiar with AWS, JavaScript, and React.
